title: COVID-19 VACCINES
cleaned_text: COVID-19 VACCINES CCH encourages vaccinations for COVID-19, as it helps to keep the most vulnerable people in our communities safe from the virus. Alongside Denver Public Health, Denver Department of Public Health, and other Healthcare Providers in Denver metro area, CCH provides vaccines according to the supply received by the state of Colorado and Governor Polis's distribution schedule. Effective immediately, all people experiencing homelessness ages 18 and above, regardless of risk factors, who are staying in congregate shelters, are eligible to receive a COVID-19 vaccine with CCH. CCH offers COVID-19 vaccinations through a variety of access points. If you are a client or client advocate and have questions about the vaccine or vaccine scheduling, please contact the health services line to speak with someone regarding the COVID-19 vaccine: 303-293-2220. A client access representative will be able to support and direct your call.
